Heart Finder Sword

one handed weapon (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 87
weap id [weapon]: 111 (Heart Finder Sword)
damage [dmg]: 10
attack [att]: +4
defence [def]: +2
length [len]: 1
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Slashing Damage [slash], Magic weapon [magic])

Extra effect on damage: Heart Finding

weap id [weapon]: 112 (Heart Finding)
damage [dmg]: Special
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
(no-effect-on-inanimate [inanimateimmune])
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune], Internal Damage [internal], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 10B to forge (B2)

The magic of this sword is released as soon as the blade hits the flesh of an enemy. The sword will unerringly seek its way to the blood-filled heart and destroy it. This results in instant death, but an enemy with high magic resistance may be able to avoid the evil of the sword.
